name: Free Forms and College Search Widget
author: ultimatecollegelist

sections.description:
Create a UCL Widget for lead collection, user or lead segmentation, lead filtering, lead direction, and more – customized for your business needs.

Creating a widget is a simple task with the UCL Widget. ğŸ˜€

Our widgets are ideal for ğŸ‘¥ lead collection, user or lead segmentation, lead filtering, lead direction, and more.

We recommend our widget to ğŸ›ï¸ Schools, Colleges, Universities to offer worldwide college search capability in their website, or anyone who wants to start collecting leads in under 5 minutes.

Moreover, Our widget can be used by any website to collect qualified leads! Especially, if you are a ğŸ’¼ business, freelancer, blogger, influencer, agency who wants to get qualified leads for business purposes.

What’s included:

ğŸ”¥ Worldwide College Search Functionality
ğŸ”¥ Campus Explorer Functionality
ğŸ”¥ Free Forms
ğŸ”¥ Build Quizzes and Questionnaires
ğŸ”¥ Collect Leads and Enquiries
ğŸ”¥ Custom Data and Analytics
ğŸ”¥ Visitor and Lead Segmentation
ğŸ”¥ Custom Colors and Branding
ğŸ”¥ Download Leads
ğŸ”¥ Custom Events
ğŸ”¥ Collect Visitor Information
ğŸ”¥ Webhooks
ğŸ”¥ Help and Support

We offer multiple options within the widgets, such as:

  1. ğŸ‘‰ Send leads or visitors to a webpage, based on the answer(s) of the lead or visitor.

  2. ğŸ‘‰ Ask a secondary question to the visitor/user based on their previous answer.

  3. ğŸ‘‰ Collect visitor information (or leads) within the widget or externally.

  4. ğŸ‘‰ Show different colleges to the visitor based on their answers (we have worldwide colleges and universities data).

Whatever your industry, you can always use the UCL Widget to filter leads, direct them to a webpage, and collect leads based on your unique business needs.

For the education industry, we offer an ‘In-Widget’ option with the college search within the widget – offering you the ability to add a college search functionality on your website while keeping all users, visitors and leads data within your business ecosystem.

To create your widget;

  1. Install the plugin

  2. Activate the plugin

  3. Create or login to your UCL account

  4. Navigate to widgets, and click ‘Create Widget’

  5. Once in the builder, you can add your first question to ask your audience.

  6. You can create multiple options for any question. Each option gives you the ability to perform some actions next, such as:

    • â“Ask another question
    • ğŸŒGo to webpage
    • ğŸ‘¤Collect a lead and then go to a webpage
    • ğŸ‘¤Collect a lead
    • ğŸ›ï¸Show colleges and universities to a visitor(s)
    • ğŸ›ï¸Collect a lead and then show colleges and universities to a visitor(s)

  7. If needed, you can edit any question/option or action performed by any option.

  8. You can edit the widget name by clicking on the edit icon next to the widget name in the builder.

  9. You can use the tools in the builder for assistance or get more out of the widget builder. These tools include zoom in, zoom out, preview, advanced settings, checking or validating widget to look for dead ends, and even changing the widget builder layout!

  10. You can change colours, and branding, add text on pages, add privacy notice for your lead form, and change SEO visibility, SEO title, SEO description, and whitelisted domains from the advanced settings of the widget.

  11. Once you are happy with your widget, you can easily copy+paste the shortcode code into your website, and the widget will be up and running in no time!

Here at UCL, we love surprises ğŸ¤© and seeing the unique ideas people come in with!

So, feel free to use UCL Widget for your product/service/business- and create your lead filtering, lead segmentation, lead qualification, lead direction, and lead collection system that suits your needs!

We would love to see what you come up with, and we are always here to help you anytime you need! ğŸ˜ƒ

ğŸ“– You can find detailed installation for wordpress here.

âœ‰ï¸ If you still need help, you can contact us using the form here

ğŸ’» See a demo here

sections.installation:
Installing UCL widget is very easy.

All you need is to activate the plugin, and then use the shortcode anywhere in your wordpress site with your widget id.

  1. Upload the plugin or install the plugin

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Place shortcode [ucl_widget widget_id=30096] on your webpage or post (Note: Replace 30096 with your widget id)

  4. You can get your widget id from your UCL Account Here
sections.faq:
Where can I find my widget id?

You can get your widget id from your ultimate college list account > widgets]

I am getting error, connection refused

We only support https websites. Make sure your wordpress website has an active SSL certificate and the site is available at https.
If you are still getting the error, please add your wordpress domain name into the widget settings for whitelisted domains.

Need more help?

ğŸ“– You can find detailed installation for wordpress here.

âœ‰ï¸ If you still need help, you can contact us using the form here
